{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.06873v1", "title": "A note on measurings and higher order Hochschild homology of algebras", "summary": "We know that coalgebra measurings behave like generalized maps between
algebras. In this note, we show that coalgebra measurings between commutative
algebras induce morphisms between higher order Hochschild homology groups of
algebras. By higher order Hochschild homology, we mean the the Hochschild
homology groups of a commutative algebra with respect to a simplicial set as
introduced by Pirashvili.", "main_category": "math.RA", "categories": "math.RA", "published": "2025-04-09T13:24:20Z"}
